item.title: Gmail and Keyboard Navigation
item.description: I use the keyboard shortcuts [ and ] a lot in gmail. However, when I do I establish a “direction” but sometimes, I press e as I want to go back to the thread list. I don’t always navigate the same direction. For a while I turned on the “auto advance”: Option. Today I abandoned it mostly because it doesn’t support the notion of “inertia” IMHO..
